channel.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
channel.description:
Gonna start looking into adding a new non-Killer Neutral soonish, will likely take at least a month to get everything ready for one.
So if you've seen any idea for Neutrals that you like, or made your own, feel free to link it here.

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
I might have something like that…

The Megalomaniac

Neutral Offensive/killer
Determined (Passive) - Immune to death at night once
Fake testament (Day) - Fake a testament grating you royal right to the throne giving you the Royal Blood passive for the next day. - 2 uses
Stalk (Night) Discover if the target is either The Cult Leader, The Prince or The Mastermind.- infinte uses
opress (Night)** Force a player to target you if its not a conversion prevent it and occupy him instead bypasses occupy immunity

Win condition: Become The Cult Leader, The king or The assaisin and fullfill there win conditions
if The megalomaniac becomes king he becomes a Psycho king

unseen version; The crazed lacky
Driven (Passive) - Immune to occupation at night and immune to most target changing
Determined (Passive) - Immune to death at night once
Endurens Training (Day) occupy yourself tonight - infinite uses
Forage (Night) forage for nightshade in the forest giving The Assassin another charge of Nightshade

lore The Megalomaniac was born as a peasant son being the youngest of 5 he was always serving his parents and older brother but deepinside he knew he was ment for something greater and the first time he stood before the court he realised something. These fools dont even know there own man, there own family , there own children how can these person even rule the country! no wonder so many died in the war if the can’t even do something simpel as recognising there own children then these fools are not worthy of the Throne.

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: TheSenate
item.description:
A foreign faction could work in this game, possibly as a neutral faction that can spawn even with cult/unseen, and only has one member to begin with. Since this would make BD less likely to win, they should be limited to 2 members.

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Hey, I was thinking of a “Foreign Invasion” faction yesterday. I think according to the Lore, Unseen and Cult are secular and religious conspiracies against the government from within. Basically traitors. So it’d be cool if we got a new evil faction who were actually outside invaders. Like barbarians or spies.

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: TheSenate
item.description:
Foreign Agent (Neutral, Social, Unique)
Unique Mannerisms (passive) - appears suspicious to sheriffs/paladins on the first night
Unfamiliar Politics (passive) - you cannot vote to put someone on trial until a trial has been carried out.
Twilight Poison (Day) - if the target has royal blood, or is the starting king, this poison will kill them in 2 nights and cannot be healed (although it is stopped by poison immunity). If they don’t, they will die in 4 nights. They are only informed of being poisoned the day before they die, and are unable to use day abilities on that day.
Blood Sample (Night) - test a target for royal blood. (Unlimited)
Infiltrate Society (Night) - kill a target If they have royal blood. Take their name, class, and logs, and replacing your passive abilities with theirs. (1 Use, not charged if occupied or prevented, but you are charged of redirected or targeted a non royal player)
Exiled for failure (Night) (Only usable if Infiltrate Society was unsuccessful) - kill a target. All players will know that they were killed by a foreign agent.

Win conditions: Wins if all royals are dead and currently king, ending the game immediately, with all other players losing. Also wins if the forgein agent successfully used Exiled for failure on at least 5 people.

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: Morkimus
item.description:
Perhaps I’m too late, but I felt like giving this a try too.

The Spymaster

Neutral Investigative

Goal: Live to see every Royal Blood in the game killed, excluding the king. You will know when your goal has been achieved, but not how many Royal Bloods are in the game.

Passives:
Underlings: If you become King, your goal remains the same and you will gain 2 uses of Fatal Guards in addition to the rest of your abilities.

Hired Thugs: Immune to conversion. Death immune once.

Day Abilities:
At Any Price: Shoot and kill a player in front of the court. If any Royal Bloods remain afterwards, your mission is compromised and you will commit suicide. This does not prevent trials during the rest of the day. (1 use. Can’t be used during a trial.)

Night Abilities:
Genealogic Investigation: Investigate a player’s family. You will know if they have Royal Blood. (Infinite uses)

Dynastic Surgery: Send a lackey to attack a player. If you successfully kill a player with Royal Blood this way, you gain its passive. Does not count as a visit. If you kill a non-royal, this ability gains a 2-night cooldown. (Infinite uses,1-night cooldown)

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)

No. He has to be alive on Day 8. He can die afterwards though.

item.title: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
I saw this so I quickly wipped up a random class. If it sucks, I know. It sides with king and relies a lot on king to give a faction information.

The Royal Messenger

Neutral Investigative

Passive (Sense Trickery) - Immune to trollboxing, poison, bleeding, distraction by Assassin, and appearing to be a different class when possessed by Possessor or defiled by Herbalist. This passive will not be retained upon class change.

Passive (Royal Blood) - [Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.

Day Ability (Report) - Choose a player. On choice, the King will be notified of who the player visited the night before. 3 uses.

Night Ability (Royal Drama) - The whole lobby will be notfified of who vistited players with Royal blood tonight when the next day starts. Includes King. 2 uses.

Night Ability (Check for Treason) - Check a player. If they are not the same faction as the king, you will be notified. You will not know which faction this is. 3 uses.

Goal: Live to see the faction the current king opposes be defeated. (If it gets to where there is no more kings, live to see the faction the last living king opposed be defeated) (If you are king, you will be neutral and only must survive)

Read full topic
item.source: Give Me Neuts (NKs need not apply)
